description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Bacon Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Egg & Bacon Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, line a baking tray with baking paper. Place tomatoes on tray and drizzle with vinegar and remaining oil, then season. Bake for the last 15 minutes of pie cooking time or until tomatoes just start to collapse. Serve pie topped with tomatoes and basil.
